html:
Sales Invoice

Invoice No: {{ doc.name }} Date: {{ doc.posting_date }}
Customer: {{ frappe.get_value("Owner", doc.owner, "owner_name") or "No Owner" }} Contact: {{ frappe.get_value("Owner", doc.owner, "contact") or "No Contact Info" }}
Billing Address: {{ doc.customer_address }}

Work Information

Work Name: {{ frappe.get_value("Work Item", doc.work_type_name, "work_item_name") or "No Work Name" }} Description: {{ frappe.get_value("Work Item", doc.work_type_name, "description") or "No Description" }}
Plot: {{ doc.plot }} Total Cost: {{ doc.total_cost }}

Labor

{% for labor in doc.labor_table %} {% endfor %}
Labor Name Number of Units Unit Unit Price Total Price
{{ labor.labor_name }} {{ labor.number_of_labor_units }} {{ labor.labor_unit }} {{ labor.unit_price }} {{ labor.total_price }}

Equipment

{% for equipment in doc.equipment_table %} {% endfor %}
Equipment Name Number of Units Unit Unit Price Total Price
{{ equipment.item_name }} {{ equipment.number_of_equipment_units }} {{ equipment.equipment_unit }} {{ equipment.unit_price }} {{ equipment.total_price }}

Material

{% for material in doc.material_table %} {% endfor %}
Material Name Number of Units Unit Unit Price Total Price
{{ material.material_name }} {{ material.number_of_material_units }} {{ material.material_unit }} {{ material.unit_price }} {{ material.total_price }}

Total Amount

Total Cost: {{ doc.total_cost }}

Thank you for your business!

If you have any questions regarding this invoice, please contact us at {{ frappe.get_value("Owner", doc.owner, "contact") or "No Contact Info" }}
name: Plot Work Sales Invoice
